## Champions Cohorts

The Water Boards Openscapes Champions Program is a mentorship and professional development opportunity for individuals and teams at the Water Boards.

### Current and Upcoming Cohorts

2026 Fall Water Boards Cohorts: From mid-August through mid-October 2026, the Water Boards will host two Champions Cohorts.

-   [Fall 2026 Tue AM Cohort](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/swrcb-openscapes/cohorts/swrcb_2026T.html)
-   [Fall 2026 Wed PM Cohort](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/swrcb-openscapes/cohorts/swrcb_2026W.html)

Water Boards individuals and teams can apply to join these cohorts as mentors or participants starting May 1, 2026. Applications will close on Jun 30, 2026. To learn more:

-   Check out: [Am I ready to be an Openscapes Mentor?](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/swrcb-openscapes/mentors/mentor_guidance.html#cohort-mentors)
-   Check out: [Is my team ready for Openscapes?](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/swrcb-openscapes/about_at_swrcb/team_guidance.html) which also applies to individuals who would like to apply to participate.
-   Attend one of the [Roadshow Presentations](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/swrcb-openscapes/events.html#road-show-presentations) scheduled for Jan - May 2026
-   Join an [Openscapes Office Hour](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/swrcb-openscapes/events.html#openscapes-office-hours) to ask questions and see if applying for a 2026 cohort is a good fit for you!
